data.name: KOF Mashup Costume Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

Characters from the legendary fighting game pioneer THE KING OF FIGHTERS lend some of their costumes to the fighters of Dead or Alive! This set contains all 6 KOF Mashup costumes. These costumes do not include destructible functionality. Content included: - KOF Mashup - Kasumi & Kasumi Todoh - KOF Mashup - Kokoro & Kasumi Todoh - KOF Mashup - Ayane & Yuri Sakazaki - KOF Mashup - Hitomi & Yuri Sakazaki - KOF Mashup - Marie Rose & Hinako Shijo - KOF Mashup - Honoka & Hinako Shijo Please do not purchase this content if you have already purchased a set in which it is included. This content is included in the following sets: - KOF Mashup Content Set Notes: *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
data.about_the_game:
Characters from the legendary fighting game pioneer THE KING OF FIGHTERS lend some of their costumes to the fighters of Dead or Alive!

This set contains all 6 KOF Mashup costumes.
These costumes do not include destructible functionality.

Content included:
- KOF Mashup - Kasumi & Kasumi Todoh
- KOF Mashup - Kokoro & Kasumi Todoh
- KOF Mashup - Ayane & Yuri Sakazaki
- KOF Mashup - Hitomi & Yuri Sakazaki
- KOF Mashup - Marie Rose & Hinako Shijo
- KOF Mashup - Honoka & Hinako Shijo

Please do not purchase this content if you have already purchased a set in which it is included.
This content is included in the following sets:
- KOF Mashup Content Set

Notes:
*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
data.short_description: Characters from the legendary fighting game pioneer THE KING OF FIGHTERS lend some of their costumes to the fighters of Dead or Alive! This set contains all 6 KOF Mashup costumes. These costumes do not include destructible functionality.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
